This is a qml port of qtracker. I've stopped working on this version in favor of the branched qTracker-client and qTrackerd versions.

see [http://code.google.com/p/qtracker/wiki/qTracker_client qTracker Client] and [http://code.google.com/p/qtracker/wiki/qTracker_server qTracker Server]
